researchData.title: AI-based Hybrid Model for Breast Cancer Predictive Analytics
researchData.description: A research and thesis using Neo4j Graph Database and Python to construct an AI-based hybrid model for breast cancer predictive analytics. This research aims to detect secondary breast tumours early. To analyse malignant cell hierarchy and classify the condition, a hybrid model combines expert- and data-driven methodologies.
researchData.image: /images/work/AI-based Hybrid Model for Breast Cancer Predictive Analytics-img.png

researchData.title: Synthetic Data Production for Machine Learning using Robotic Arm
researchData.description: A research and thesis on Synthetic Data Production for Machine Learning using a Robotic arm, in which we designed PCBs, worked on OpenCV libraries, ROS and implement the system in C++ and Python.
researchData.image: /images/work/Synthetic Data Production for Machine Learning using Robotic Arm-img.png
